channel.title: Market Research on Ankit Dhall

item.title: Ontario Museum Association Market Research
item.description: The purpose of this research is to understand the favourability of digital museums amongst people and help the client make changes in accordance with the market demand. This research would help gauge consumer perception about the digitalization of museums and enable us to find opportunities for further improvement. Link to Project Results
